name: gulp-file-sync
description: Sync file It keeps your files synced between two directory. In other words, any change of files in one directory will automatically take place in another one.

scripts.cov: istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Kayo Lee <330956999@qq.com>
